name: Face Recognition Attendance System
desc: A face recognition attendance system uses facial verification to automatically record an employee's attendance and scan their facial features

name: Indoor Navigation in AR
desc: This Can Be Viewed Through A Device's Camera, Like A Smartphone. AR-Based Indoor Navigation Can Help Users Navigate Through Complex Buildings Without Using Physical Maps Or Help Desks.

name: Super App Framework For Multi-Application (OneGenius)
